description: Building intuitive and visually stunning experiences, one line of code at a time.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: As a frontend developer, I'm passionate about crafting exceptional user experiences with React. I believe in writing clean, modular, and type-safe code that's both functional and visually stunning. Passionate about programming and video games, I am a self-learner with an analytical focus and a quick learning ability.
about.paragraph2: With a keen eye for detail and a drive for innovation, I'm always seeking out new challenges and ways to improve my code. Let's build something amazing together!

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: What I am great at
skills.description: Take a look at the skills that fuel my creativity and drive my passion for building amazing digital products

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Explore my portfolio of projects, where I blend creativity and technology, primarily offering solutions in React. This portfolio is constantly updated. Stay tuned for updates!
projects.Jump2Digital: Rick And Morty app made for Jump2Digital hackathon with Typescript and React
projects.CAPBA: Landing page created for Colleague of Architects from Buenos Aires. The website is done with HTML, CSS, and JS.
projects.Juguetería Cósmica: Demo for a ecommerce for my Bootcamp. Developed with JS and Node, uses MongoDB Atlas and styled in SASS.
projects.Game App: React game app consuming API that shows the ammount of reviews on Steam for the game you are looking for.
projects.Weather App: Weather app crafted with React, CSS, and HTML. Delivers accurate forecasts with an intuitive and elegant interface.
projects.InfoBoard: Dashboard developed for Infojobs and Midudev Hackathon. Save searches, show offers and their statistics.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Ways to contact
contact.descripition: Want to collaborate on a project, discuss a potential opportunity, or just say hello? I'd love to hear from you You can reach me on any of this ways and send me a message. Let's connect and explore how we can create something amazing together. I look forward to hearing from you!
